data.message: What if i dont want to see this. Like ever?

replies.message: Hi Danny. You can't block Facebook ads entirely. Ads help keep Facebook free and we strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you using ad preferences. -Rose
Hey facebook, you have more than enough money to hve fb free and adless at the end of the day if you charged no one would pay and you would be forced to close just like ur forcing us to have adds

It is refreshing to see others with the same concern as I. Perhaps if you charged each member  penny a day to use your site you would never have to fear being in the red, which is in itself a purely fanciful notion.

Oh, boo hoo. If seeing a few unwanted ads on Facebook is the worst thing that happened to you today, then I think you're gonna live. Don't like it? Find another site. It is not that serious. And from your replies, it seems like you're just bitter people.
Very true Monique Smith. I just simply asked a question to facebook and I got a most decent reply from them. Thank you for your concern Monique and the time to reply to my comment. :)
